item.title: Advanced Data Science
item.description: We deliver end-to-end data science solutions including: Data Collection & Storage, Visualizations & Dashboards, and Advanced Machine Learning.

item.title: Mobile & Web Apps
item.description: We build high quality Web and Mobile apps for e-commerce, social networking, conferencing, dashboards and many more, with the tech stack of your choice.

item.title: Trainings & Bootcamps
item.description: We provide online and in-person training & bootcamp services in JavaScript and Python programming, web/mobile app development, and data analytics.

item.title: Trouble Shooting & Devops
item.description: We offer services in the following areas: server trouble-shoot, server configuration, server monitoring, database migration, and all other devops related tasks.
